item.title: 0871 HL
item.description: score:871 Chances: Hecla Mining’s silver production for the second quarter of 2023 is on track to reach 3.8 million ounces, contributing to a total target of 17 million ounces for the year. The acquisition of ATAC Resources Ltd. and the investment in Cascadia Minerals Ltd.
